title: Most of the 43 killed in an explosion at a Cuban hotel were hotel workers
content:
1. Most of the 43 killed in an explosion at a Cuban hotel were hotel workers  NPR
  2. Rescue Workers continue to search for survivors after Cuban hotel explosion  NBC News
  3. Death toll from explosion at Havana hotel rises to 40  The Associated Press - en Español
  4. Cuba hotel blast toll rises to 43 — most hotel workers  Press-Enterprise
  5. Havana explosion: Search continues for three Hotel Saratoga workers trapped in the rubble  Miami Herald
contentSnippet:

localize.title: キューバのホテルで起きた爆発事故で、死者43人のほとんどはホテル従業員だった
古巴一家酒店发生爆炸，43名死者中大部分是酒店工作人员
古巴一家酒店發生爆炸，43名死者中大部分是酒店工作人員
